What is the difference between Standard and 8KO® lenses?

Standard is our original lens technology, engineered and precisely manufactured from 2mm polycarbonate with triple-layer scratch resistance, 100% UV and impact protection and perfect optics, no matter how extreme the conditions. Standard lenses are available across our Lifestyle Series™ and our Snow Series™.

8KO® stands for 8K Optics. 8KO® is the most advanced lens technology on the planet, with lenses manufactured from 2mm co-nylon, which is optically superior and lighter than industry-standard polycarbonate. 8KO® lenses offer the same triple-layer scratch resistance as our Standard Lenses with 100% UV and impact protection but with superior optical clarity and a lighter weight, offering unrivalled performance and a new advantage in every situation. 8KO® lenses are now available across both our Pace Series™ and our Lifestyle Series™.
